content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I understand you might need assistance with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC. To get started, may I have your name, please?
Thanks, Emily! Could you please provide your address so I can check if we're able to service your location?
Thank you! We do service your area. Could you tell me a bit about the plumbing issue you're experiencing?
Actually, I was considering service, but I've decided I don't need to schedule anything right now. Thanks though!
No problem, Emily! If you need help in the future, feel free to reach out to XYZ Home Services. Have a great day!
reason: Customer changed mind about needing the service
